trans-unit.source: Code sample: Retry logic from Enterprise Library, in C# for connecting to SQL Database | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Code sample: Retry logic from Enterprise Library, in C# for connecting to SQL Database | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Enterprise Library is designed to ease the task of including retry logic to your client programs that access cloud services.
trans-unit.target: Enterprise Library is designed to ease the task of including retry logic to your client programs that access cloud services.

trans-unit.source: This topic presents a complete code sample that demonstrates the Enterprise Library (EntLib).
trans-unit.target: This topic presents a complete code sample that demonstrates the Enterprise Library (EntLib).

trans-unit.source: EntLib eases the programmer's task of including retry logic in their client that interact with the SQL Database cloud service of Microsoft Azure.
trans-unit.target: EntLib eases the programmer's task of including retry logic in their client that interact with the SQL Database cloud service of Microsoft Azure.

trans-unit.source: Enterprise Library 6 (EntLib60) is the latest version.
trans-unit.target: Enterprise Library 6 (EntLib60) is the latest version.

trans-unit.source: The following links are recommended for in-depth information about EntLib:
trans-unit.target: The following links are recommended for in-depth information about EntLib:

trans-unit.source:
Enterprise Library 6 – April 2013
Provides numerous links to further information.
trans-unit.target:
Enterprise Library 6 – April 2013
Provides numerous links to further information.

trans-unit.source:
Free ebook in .PDF format from Microsoft:
Developer's Guide to Microsoft Enterprise Library, 2nd Edition.
trans-unit.target:
Free ebook in .PDF format from Microsoft:
Developer's Guide to Microsoft Enterprise Library, 2nd Edition.

trans-unit.source: EntLib is not included when you install Visual Studio and Microsoft .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: EntLib is not included when you install Visual Studio and Microsoft .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: You must perform a separate download action.
trans-unit.target: You must perform a separate download action.

trans-unit.source: The NuGet system through Visual Studio makes the download easy.
trans-unit.target: The NuGet system through Visual Studio makes the download easy.

trans-unit.source: The download results in a directory named packages\ under the same directory where your Visual Studio solution .sln file is stored.
trans-unit.target: The download results in a directory named packages\ under the same directory where your Visual Studio solution .sln file is stored.

trans-unit.source: The EntLib assembly .dll files are installed in a subdirectory.
trans-unit.target: The EntLib assembly .dll files are installed in a subdirectory.

trans-unit.source: The two assembly files are named as follows:
trans-unit.target: The two assembly files are named as follows:

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling.dll
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling.dll

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling.Data.dll
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling.Data.dll

trans-unit.source: The C# code sample consists of three .cs files whose content is pasted into the sections that follow.
trans-unit.target: The C# code sample consists of three .cs files whose content is pasted into the sections that follow.

trans-unit.source: Their file names are:
trans-unit.target: Their file names are:

trans-unit.source: Program.cs
trans-unit.target: Program.cs

trans-unit.source: Custom_SqlDatabaseTransientErrorDetectionStrategy.cs
trans-unit.target: Custom_SqlDatabaseTransientErrorDetectionStrategy.cs

trans-unit.source: ForcePersistent_SqlCommandTransientErrorDetectionStrategy.cs
trans-unit.target: ForcePersistent_SqlCommandTransientErrorDetectionStrategy.cs

trans-unit.source: Another .cs file provided is a much shorter version of Program.cs.
trans-unit.target: Another .cs file provided is a much shorter version of Program.cs.

trans-unit.source: All the try/catch code has been removed.
trans-unit.target: All the try/catch code has been removed.

trans-unit.source: This makes it easier for the eye to see the EntLib calls.
trans-unit.target: This makes it easier for the eye to see the EntLib calls.

trans-unit.source: Testing your retry logic is tricky because there is no obvious way to cause a genuine transient fault error.
trans-unit.target: Testing your retry logic is tricky because there is no obvious way to cause a genuine transient fault error.

trans-unit.source: One test solution is to use temporary code to:
trans-unit.target: One test solution is to use temporary code to:

trans-unit.source: Cause a pretend transient fault.
trans-unit.target: Cause a pretend transient fault.

trans-unit.source: Fix the cause of the transient fault.
trans-unit.target: Fix the cause of the transient fault.

trans-unit.source: Retry the connection or query, expecting success.
trans-unit.target: Retry the connection or query, expecting success.

trans-unit.source: To help you test, another .cs file is provided that you can use as a temporary substitute:
trans-unit.target: To help you test, another .cs file is provided that you can use as a temporary substitute:

trans-unit.source: Test2_TransientErrorDetectionStrategy
trans-unit.target: Test2_TransientErrorDetectionStrategy

trans-unit.source: Temporary replacement for Custom_SqlDatabaseTransientErrorDetectionStrategy.cs.
trans-unit.target: Temporary replacement for Custom_SqlDatabaseTransientErrorDetectionStrategy.cs.

trans-unit.source: The code locations at which to make changes for this testing are tagged with a comment that contains the string TEST.PASSWORD_FIX.
trans-unit.target: The code locations at which to make changes for this testing are tagged with a comment that contains the string TEST.PASSWORD_FIX.

trans-unit.source: You can compile the sample with the following steps:
trans-unit.target: You can compile the sample with the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, create a new project from the C# Console Application template.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, create a new project from the C# Console Application template.

trans-unit.source: Right-click your project, and then add the .cs files for which source code is provided in this topic.
trans-unit.target: Right-click your project, and then add the .cs files for which source code is provided in this topic.

trans-unit.source: In a cmd.exe command window, run the program as shown next.
trans-unit.target: In a cmd.exe command window, run the program as shown next.

trans-unit.source: Actual output from a run is also shown:
trans-unit.target: Actual output from a run is also shown:

trans-unit.source: ConsoleApplication1.exe
trans-unit.target: ConsoleApplication1.exe

trans-unit.source: The C# source code for the .cs files are in the following sections.
trans-unit.target: The C# source code for the .cs files are in the following sections.

trans-unit.source: The following code file, Program.cs, is long because it contains try/catch blocks that execute only if an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: The following code file, Program.cs, is long because it contains try/catch blocks that execute only if an error occurs.

trans-unit.source: Near the end of the present topic is a much shorter version of Program.cs with all the try/catch lines removed.
trans-unit.target: Near the end of the present topic is a much shorter version of Program.cs with all the try/catch lines removed.

trans-unit.source: The Main method is in Program.cs.
trans-unit.target: The Main method is in Program.cs.

trans-unit.source: The call stack runs as follows:
trans-unit.target: The call stack runs as follows:

trans-unit.source: Main calls ConnectAndQuery.
trans-unit.target: Main calls ConnectAndQuery.

trans-unit.source: ConnectAndQuery calls InitializeFields.
trans-unit.target: ConnectAndQuery calls InitializeFields.

trans-unit.source: ConnectAndQuery calls EstablishConnection.
trans-unit.target: ConnectAndQuery calls EstablishConnection.

trans-unit.source: EstablishConnection calls IssueQueryCommand.
trans-unit.target: EstablishConnection calls IssueQueryCommand.

trans-unit.source: EntLib60 has a class named ReliableSqlConnection.
trans-unit.target: EntLib60 has a class named ReliableSqlConnection.

trans-unit.source: You can control how the connection instance decides whether an exception is a transient error by assigning to it a class that implements ITransientErrorDetectionStrategy.
trans-unit.target: You can control how the connection instance decides whether an exception is a transient error by assigning to it a class that implements ITransientErrorDetectionStrategy.

trans-unit.source: EntLib60 offers the class SqlDatabaseTransientErrorDetectionStrategy.
trans-unit.target: EntLib60 offers the class SqlDatabaseTransientErrorDetectionStrategy.

trans-unit.source: But in this topic we chose to implement and use our own custom class Custom_SqlDatabaseTransientErrorDetectionStrategy.
trans-unit.target: But in this topic we chose to implement and use our own custom class Custom_SqlDatabaseTransientErrorDetectionStrategy.

trans-unit.source: Our custom class has a whitelist of values to compare against SqlException.Number.
trans-unit.target: Our custom class has a whitelist of values to compare against SqlException.Number.

trans-unit.source: This custom class that implements ITransientErrorDetectionStrategy enforces our choice to never consider let EntLib60 consider any query command error to be merely transient.
trans-unit.target: This custom class that implements ITransientErrorDetectionStrategy enforces our choice to never consider let EntLib60 consider any query command error to be merely transient.

trans-unit.source: Instead, the overall program is designed to assess the SqlException.Number in its own custom logic.
trans-unit.target: Instead, the overall program is designed to assess the SqlException.Number in its own custom logic.

trans-unit.source: With the class in this section, we made the design choice to have our program discard and recreate a new connection before retrying any failed query command, transient or not.
trans-unit.target: With the class in this section, we made the design choice to have our program discard and recreate a new connection before retrying any failed query command, transient or not.

trans-unit.source: It is tricky to test your EntLib60 program.
trans-unit.target: It is tricky to test your EntLib60 program.

trans-unit.source: It is difficult to cause a genuinely transient error, and to controls its timings.
trans-unit.target: It is difficult to cause a genuinely transient error, and to controls its timings.

trans-unit.source: This demo code includes a simple technique you can use to mimic a transient error.
trans-unit.target: This demo code includes a simple technique you can use to mimic a transient error.

trans-unit.source: The technique is to use our custom detector Test2_TransientErrorDetectionStrategy class in place of the Custom_SqlTransientErrorDetectionStrategy class.
trans-unit.target: The technique is to use our custom detector Test2_TransientErrorDetectionStrategy class in place of the Custom_SqlTransientErrorDetectionStrategy class.

trans-unit.source: This way you can force the ReliableSqlConnection of EntLib60 to assess all SqlException occurrences as being transient.
trans-unit.target: This way you can force the ReliableSqlConnection of EntLib60 to assess all SqlException occurrences as being transient.

trans-unit.source: The trick is to have the program self-fix the problem before the first retry.
trans-unit.target: The trick is to have the program self-fix the problem before the first retry.

trans-unit.source: An easy approach is to start with a misspelled value for the connection password.
trans-unit.target: An easy approach is to start with a misspelled value for the connection password.

trans-unit.source: When this causes an SqlException, with sqlExc.Number==18456, the program must fix the password.
trans-unit.target: When this causes an SqlException, with sqlExc.Number==18456, the program must fix the password.

trans-unit.source: On the retry the program succeeds.
trans-unit.target: On the retry the program succeeds.

trans-unit.source: To implement this test in our demo program, search the source code for all occurrences of TEST.PASSWORD_FIX.
trans-unit.target: To implement this test in our demo program, search the source code for all occurrences of TEST.PASSWORD_FIX.

trans-unit.source: After you find all occurrences of TEST.PASSWORD_FIX and make the changes that are explained in comments at each location, you will have made the following changes:
trans-unit.target: After you find all occurrences of TEST.PASSWORD_FIX and make the changes that are explained in comments at each location, you will have made the following changes:

trans-unit.source: In the live code in the InitializeFields method, change the password value to an incorrect value.
trans-unit.target: In the live code in the InitializeFields method, change the password value to an incorrect value.

trans-unit.source:
In // commented code, in the EstablishConnection method, there is an entire catch block...
//catch (SDSqlC.SqlException sqlExc)
that is commented out.
trans-unit.target:
In // commented code, in the EstablishConnection method, there is an entire catch block...
//catch (SDSqlC.SqlException sqlExc)
that is commented out.

trans-unit.source: Uncomment the whole block.
trans-unit.target: Uncomment the whole block.

trans-unit.source: In the newly uncommented catch block, assign the correct password value.
trans-unit.target: In the newly uncommented catch block, assign the correct password value.

trans-unit.source: Where the class Custom_TransientErrorDetectionStrategy is referenced in the code, replace the reference with Test2_TransientErrorDetectionStrategy.
trans-unit.target: Where the class Custom_TransientErrorDetectionStrategy is referenced in the code, replace the reference with Test2_TransientErrorDetectionStrategy.

trans-unit.source: You can keep the variable name the same.
trans-unit.target: You can keep the variable name the same.

trans-unit.source: The shorter code in this section does compile, and if run it would usually work.
trans-unit.target: The shorter code in this section does compile, and if run it would usually work.

trans-unit.source: But the shorter code is not meant to be run in production.
trans-unit.target: But the shorter code is not meant to be run in production.

trans-unit.source: The only purpose of this shorter Program.cs sample is to make it easier to see the same EntLib calls that are in the real Program.cs.
trans-unit.target: The only purpose of this shorter Program.cs sample is to make it easier to see the same EntLib calls that are in the real Program.cs.

trans-unit.source: The removal of all the try/catch blocks makes the EntLib calls easier to see.
trans-unit.target: The removal of all the try/catch blocks makes the EntLib calls easier to see.
